text: (nabiye,) ni vallakaryattilum erpetukayea, atinepparri khur'anil ninn vallatum otikelpikkukayea, ninnal etenkilum pravarttanattil erpetukayea ceyyunnuvenkil ninnalatil mulukunna samayatt ninnalute mel saksiyayi nam untakatirikkukayilla. bhumiyilea akasattea ulla oru anuvealamulla yateannum ninre raksitavi (nre srad'dhayi) l ninn vittupeakukayilla. atinekkal cerutea valutea ayittulla yateannum spastamaya oru rekhayil ulpetattatayi illa
